name: ArduinoPhone
tagline: ArduinoPhone, a phone with Arduino(or Seeeduino), and GPRS Shield , and TFT Touch Shield!!!
body:
### Intro
ArduinoPhone is a Mobile Phone make with Arduino(or Seeeduino) and some other modules.

ArduinoPhone features:
 - Phone call
 - SMS
 - Contacts form
 - Clock
 - **Gesture for navigate UI**
 - Touch input

Before you uplaod source code to Arduino, you should copy all contents in `Libraries` Directory into `..arduino-1.0.4\libraries`.

If you want to know how build it step by step, look at [this](http://www.instructables.com/id/ArduinoPhone/).

Modules:

1.[Arduino Uno](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/arduino-uno-rev3-p-694.html?cPath=6_7)

2.[TFT Touch Shield](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/28-tft-touch-shield-v20-p-1286.html?cPath=34_36)

3.[GPRS Shield](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/gprs-shield-v20-p-1379.html?cPath=19_20)

4.[RTC](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/grove-rtc-p-758.html?cPath=25_30)

5.[Custom ArduinoPhone Charge Circuit (or Lipo Rider)](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/lipo-rider-p-710.html?cPath=1_75)

6.[Li-po battery](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/lithium-ion-polymer-battery-2a-p-603.html?cPath=1_3)

7.A shell (with 3D printer)
